children.name: children
conversations:
You attempt to speak to the children, but they are too caught up in their game of tag. 
You hear one of the children teases, “If you get caught you will go missing too!”
I've never seen that cat before
My papa told me that the pastor won't come outside

villagers.name: villagers
conversations:
The villagers tell you that another child went missing last night and that sightings 
of monsters have been becoming more frequent over the last week near the woods.

I wouldn't go to the Farm, if I were you. 
There's been strange happenings at night.
No one can be trusted these days. I saw my servant whispering spells

clerk.name: clerk
conversations: Where did that cat come from? Have you seen it?
The pastor sure has been acting strange lately.

keep.name: keep
conversations: Strange things be happening' around here lately...

pastor.name: pastor
conversations:
The pastor turns to you but he’s not who he seems. 
He’s covered in blood with two fangs sneaking from his grin. 
“I think you have too many sins,“ he cries, as he lunges at you!
